about_the_game:
A thrilling, first-person, action-survival game set in the modern post-apocalypse. As mankind’s last hope, you’ll traverse the hospital ravaged by a lethal plague. Dive headlong into total chaos and destruction as you desperately search for Subject Zero, the first human to turn. The game presents players with a variety of dangerous environments where the fight for survival gets progressively more difficult as the story unfolds. Make sure you stockpile some extra ammo!


  • STORY-DRIVEN-GAMEPLAY

    You will find yourself in an abandoned hospital with full of mysteries and seek for a cure to understand the incidents occurred in the past. More you interact with items more you will reveal the dark mystery.

  • SMARTER THAN HUMAN

    More sensitive mutants will get triggered and alerted by your movements, you might be suddenly surrounded by them!

  • SOLVE A VARIETY OF PUZZLES

    There are different puzzles in hospital, each of them will help you expose the hidden story and uncover new dark rooms.

    • SUPPLIES ARE QUITE SCARCE THESE DAYS

      In-game inventory system for management of weapons, ammo, health boosters, mission items, and more.

content_descriptors.notes: This content includes depictions of self-harm, violent
